item.description:
Wednesday Night Singles Dance

Nov., 16th. 8:30- 12:30 pm.

Mickees on the Water

 512 Middlesex Tpke

Billerica, Ma.

No Cover Charge, Cash Bar-Lottery, & Entertainment.

Host: Johnny Baz, our Dj.

Co-host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

   Baz wrote:

        As your Dj, playing your requests. I wanted to let you all know, that I found a new venue function hall for dancing.  So I would like to invited Steve O., and all the Meetup dancers to join us, every Wednesday night from 8:30 to 12:30 pm.  There will be a cash bar and plenty of free parking. Steve O. will have some tables reserved with signs on them.  He will also be there to introduce all those who join us early. As it get closer tp 9pm. it is difficult to indroce people. Because veryone is on the dance floor, and no one is at our tables.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables
item.name: Wednesday Night Singles Dance
